name: Compact
description:
My submission for the 2021 Epic MegaJam.  In COMPACT you are a Recycleables Recovery Robot trying to reclaim as many recycleable materials from the compactor before they (and you) run out of space and are incinerated!

The game was created from scratch by myself, Reid Bianco, in Unreal Engine 4.26 using free assets and materials from Quixel and GameTextures.com, with sounds and music from WeLoveIndies.com.  Additional free Marketplace assets were used: "Modular Low Poly Robots" by UDevLemon, "FX Variety Pack" by Kakky, "Good Sky" by Uneasy, and "UIWS" by Egray.io.
